articles.title: Former Patriots quarterback Jarrett Stidham gets long-awaited opportunity stepping in for injured Broncos starter Bo Nix
articles.description:
The game will feature the only two people who Stidham has taken play calls from, the Broncos’ Sean Payton and the Patriots’ Josh McDaniels.

The post Former Patriots quarterback Jarrett Stidham gets long-awaited opportunity stepping in for injured Broncos starter Bo Nix appeared first on Boston.com.
